input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product features and product title.

Product title:
LMP-F270 - Lamp With Housing For Sony VPL-FE40, VPL-FX40, VPL-FX41, VPL-FE40L, VPL-FW41L, VPL-FX40L Projectors

Product features:
Bulb With The Housing
AuraBeam Economy Series Television Replacement Bulb.
This is an Aurabeam Economy Series lampl For a Brighter & Sharper Picture look for the Aurabeam Professional Series replacement lamp.
180 Day Warranty Included.
Exclusive Bulbs is the only authorized reseller of AuraBeam Lamps

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
This is an Aurabeam Economy Series lamp for a brighter and sharper picture look for the Aurabeam Professional Series replacement lamp. The Aurabeam Economy Series lamp features a bulb with the housing for a Sony VPL-FE40, VPL-FX40, VPL-FX41, VPL-FE40L, VPL-FW41L, VPL-FX40L projector. The lamp is covered by a 180-day warranty. Exclusive Bulbs is the only authorized reseller of Aurabeam Lamps.

The Aurabeam Economy Series lamp features a bulb with the housing for a Sony VPL-FE40, VPL-FX40, VPL-FX41, VPL-FE40L, VPL-FW41L, VPL-FX40L projector. The lamp is covered by a 180-day warranty.
input_text.Response B: AuraBeam Economy Series Television Replacement Bulb. This is an Aurabeam Economy Series lampl For a Brighter & Sharper Picture look for the Aurabeam Professional Series replacement lamp. 180 Day Warranty Included. Exclusive Bulbs is the only authorized reseller of AuraBeam Lamps.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_b: Does not describe the item correctly in some places.
